file_content.text: Sith conquer all our Talz. Fetzellen commands this clan. Fetzellen is the strongest of clan.
We swear our lives to Jedi Xerender. We protect him as one. Sith must not pass.
This is the last moment of your life.
Then prepare to die.
Not smart.
We see--Sith are allied with renegade Broonmark. He cannot sneak us. We smell him. Tell him to appear.
I'm here for the Jedi, not you.
I mean you no harm.
Then why does Sith bring Broonmark? We cannot be fooled. We smell the renegade.
Sith, again you arrive. This is Fetzellen--the clan's betrayer! We must clean the clan. We must kill him!
Sith lets us rip him to shreds, and we pledge to you. We are of your clan and kill only for Sith. Until we are dead.
I could use a ferocious beast like you. You have a deal.
You will be my monster.
Fetzellen might kill you. Then where would I be?
If you survive the fight.
We prove our worth. We fulfill our pledge! Let us show you!
It's my kill. I never shy away from a fight.
I do my own dirty work.
We beg the Sith! We become their most loyal minion. We die for our clan. Grant our revenge!
My lord, if I may. The Talz would be a great asset.
Come on, just let the thing kill the other thing and join our group.
My lord, by binding the Talz to you, his brutal murdering can be controlled.
My lord, let the beast have his revenge. We could use a bloodthirsty murderer like him.
My Talzzi is spotty, but it sounds like the freak wants to join this outfit. We could use some front-line fodder.
Fetzellen is our vendetta. We must destroy with our hands! Ours alone! Then we join you.
Kill Fetzellen and then serve me.
The fight is yours, Broonmark.
I'll take you on, but the blubbering must cease.
Fine, just stop whining.
We are grateful. Our hunt ends now. We sate our lust for revenge.
Fetzellen! It is time to cleanse our clan. It is time to break your neck! To grind you to dust!
Peddle your services elsewhere, freak.
You'd be useless to me.
Come! We deliver death!
Rahrr! We... are... cleansed! We are the most satisfied!
Sith, our vendetta is met. Thanks to you. We are your clan. We are yours to command.
Fall in line. I have unfinished business of my own.
Onward, then.
I'm pleased to have you along.
Welcome.
You will do as I say, or be destroyed.
If you must follow, then obey!
Sith will not doubt. We are most faithful.
Welcome to the ranks, Broonmark.
Maybe you can help me bone up on my Talzzi, huh, Broonmark?
We are stronger with you along, Broonmark. Welcome.
Fight alongside me, monster. We will destroy all our enemies together.
Just remember the pecking order, Talz.
We do not talk. Sith hunt is still incomplete. Jedi Xerender must be dead. We are ready to prove our worth!
No! This insults us! Fetzellen, our business must conclude. Our clan must be clean.
We must hunt together. We must face the Sith as one.
That is sound. Together we must kill Sith.
Let's get this over with.
You both die then! [Attack.]
Die, Sith!
Stand down. This doesn't have to end violently.
You're making a big mistake.
Violence is the only way!
So glad I could bring you two together.
How nice--old mates reunited.
Our clan is joined only to kill Sith!
No! We will prove! We will kill!
